name: MakePositivityLouder
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make positivity louder
des:
I connected with random people on Instagram and asked them to send me a voice message describing the best thing that had happened to them in the past week.

I used those responses to create a repository of positivity for you to listen to as you prepare for the day, commute, work or fall asleep.

My hope is that you'll use this skill to incline your mind towards a more positive perspective. 

Less complaining, more gratitude.

___

You can shuffle the entire collection or play stories based on specific topics. The categories are friendship, experiences, work, health, gratitude & family.

You can also enable the Make Positivity Louder Flash Briefing for more content and daily challenges!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
